channel.title: Principles in Making
channel.description: Recent content on Principles in Making

item.title: Quality before quality
item.description: We often think of quality as embedded within a product. Does the product have the capabilities and craftsmanship I would expect? Is it well built? Does it function well? Those all matter, of course. But quality is as much in the building as it is in the product itself; quality before quality. I kind of knew this for a long time but have often disregarded this idea in my push to ship and iterate.
